This app is made by Rogue Redhair
 Instructions to use the app:
 1.Swipe from left and open the drawer
 2.Select People
 3.Add an individual's name by clicking on top right corner and click on done
 4.Come back to dashboard
 5.Click on top right corner
 6.In add event window enter event details and click done
 7.You can view quick details in dashboard itself
